Welcome to istSOS3’s documentation¶

IstSOS is an OGC SOS 2.0 server implementation written in Python.

Contents:

  • System Types classification
    • Point TimeSeries Observation
    • Mobile TimeSeries Observation
    • Trajectory Observation
    • Profile Observation
    • Specimen Observation
    • Specimen TimeSeries Observation
  • Inserting new sensors
    • Usage of the InsertSensor XML
    • Describing the sensor with SensorML 1.0.1
  • Inserting new observations
    • The observation id
    • Observation types
    • Usage of the SWE Array Observation Type
  • Inserting new speciments
    • Specimen Observation
  • Getting observations
    • The KVP requests

Rest API¶

istSOS implements a certain amount of API that offer some extra features that cannot be accessed throught the core SOS 2.0 standard.

  • Extra API

Developer corner¶

Thanks for your interest in contributing to istSOS 3.

istSOS 3 is written in Python 3, bla bla bla. When contributing you shall follow the PEP8 Style Guide for Python Code.

  • Architecture
  • Entities
  • Filters
  • Actions
  • Database
  • Unit testing
  • Python examples
